title: Strange Log Behavior Stages 11 - 14
body:
The logs now seem to periodically loop through stages 11 through 14 even when there hasn't been a new block?

It seems like this is related to txpool stuff?

I use Stage 14's message "Update current block for the RPC API to=x" to know if my node has stopped syncing or gotten stuck on a particular block, this causes that log to come across even if the block hasn't been updated.

I don't mind the extra logs for stages 11 - 13 but it would be nice if 14 only logged on actual update.
